trans-unit.source: Azure Mobile Engagement Android SDK Integration
trans-unit.target: Azure Mobile Engagement Android SDK Integration

trans-unit.source: Latest updates and procedures for Android SDK for Azure Mobile Engagement
trans-unit.target: Latest updates and procedures for Android SDK for Azure Mobile Engagement

trans-unit.source: Android SDK for Azure Mobile Engagement
trans-unit.target: Android SDK for Azure Mobile Engagement

trans-unit.source: Start here to get all the details on how to integrate Azure Mobile Engagement in an Android App.
trans-unit.target: Start here to get all the details on how to integrate Azure Mobile Engagement in an Android App.

trans-unit.source: If you'd like to give it a try first, make sure you do our [15 minutes tutorial](mobile-engagement-android-get-started.md).
trans-unit.target: If you'd like to give it a try first, make sure you do our [15 minutes tutorial](mobile-engagement-android-get-started.md).

trans-unit.source: Click to see the [SDK Content](mobile-engagement-android-sdk-content.md).
trans-unit.target: Click to see the [SDK Content](mobile-engagement-android-sdk-content.md).

trans-unit.source: Integration procedures
trans-unit.target: Integration procedures

trans-unit.source: Start here: [How to integrate Mobile Engagement in your Android app](mobile-engagement-android-integrate-engagement.md)
trans-unit.target: Start here: [How to integrate Mobile Engagement in your Android app](mobile-engagement-android-integrate-engagement.md)

trans-unit.source: For Notifications: [How to integrate Reach (Notifications) in your Android app](mobile-engagement-android-integrate-engagement-reach.md)
trans-unit.target: For Notifications: [How to integrate Reach (Notifications) in your Android app](mobile-engagement-android-integrate-engagement-reach.md)

trans-unit.source: Google Cloud Messaging (GCM): [How to Integrate GCM with Mobile Engagement](mobile-engagement-android-gcm-integrate.md)
trans-unit.target: Google Cloud Messaging (GCM): [How to Integrate GCM with Mobile Engagement](mobile-engagement-android-gcm-integrate.md)

trans-unit.source: Amazon Device Messaging (ADM): [How to Integrate ADM with Mobile Engagement](mobile-engagement-android-adm-integrate.md)
trans-unit.target: Amazon Device Messaging (ADM): [How to Integrate ADM with Mobile Engagement](mobile-engagement-android-adm-integrate.md)

trans-unit.source: Tag plan implementation: [How to use the advanced Mobile Engagement tagging API in your Android app](mobile-engagement-android-use-engagement-api.md)
trans-unit.target: Tag plan implementation: [How to use the advanced Mobile Engagement tagging API in your Android app](mobile-engagement-android-use-engagement-api.md)

trans-unit.source: Release notes
trans-unit.target: Release notes

trans-unit.source: Handle new permission model for Android M.
trans-unit.target: Handle new permission model for Android M.

trans-unit.source: Can now configure location features at runtime instead of using `AndroidManifest.xml`.
trans-unit.target: Can now configure location features at runtime instead of using `AndroidManifest.xml`.

trans-unit.source: Fix a permission bug: if you use `ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION`, then `ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION` is not needed anymore.
trans-unit.target: Fix a permission bug: if you use `ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION`, then `ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION` is not needed anymore.

trans-unit.source: Stability improvements.
trans-unit.target: Stability improvements.

trans-unit.source: For earlier versions, please see the [complete release notes](mobile-engagement-android-release-notes.md).
trans-unit.target: For earlier versions, please see the [complete release notes](mobile-engagement-android-release-notes.md).

trans-unit.source: Upgrade procedures
trans-unit.target: Upgrade procedures

trans-unit.source: If you already have integrated an older version of our SDK into your application please consult [Upgrade Procedures](mobile-engagement-android-upgrade-procedure.md).
trans-unit.target: If you already have integrated an older version of our SDK into your application please consult [Upgrade Procedures](mobile-engagement-android-upgrade-procedure.md).

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
